p: Other medicinal herbs and plants and culinary spices that have been described to have antiviral properties against SARS-CoV are Japanese honeysuckle ( Lonicera japonica Thunb.) ( Figure 6), the commonly known Eucalyptus tree, and Korean ginseng ( Panax ginseng) ( Figure 7), the last one through its active secondary metabolite ginsenoside-Rb1 [ 31].
